# 3.6 A5/3 crypt attack proof-of-concept demonstrator ### 3.6.1 Scope To successfully prosecute A5/3 enciphered GSM air-interface intercept requires changes to each part of the current A5/1 processing chain. This is a new requirement and has the covername of OPULENT PUP. ### 3.6.2 Requirements \& Acceptance Criteria | RFC ST1823 | | | | | :-- | :-- | :-- | :-- | | Identifier | CmR | Acceptance Criteria | Notes | | S-SMP_CmR-
